We bring updates to the App Store:

Thank You for using Pilot Trainer IFR pack. Without You, we wouldn't have more than 100.000 downloads. We are continuously working on to improve our apps based on our users' feedbacks.

The new update brings:
*New EASA & FAA instrument procedures
*New holding pattern training modules
*New IFR Simulator features
*Minor bug fixes
*Improvements – in graphic design and animations
*New explanations – help students to better understand flight situations and rules

• fixes airplane rotation problem

This update includes several bug fixes and a few small performance improvement. So bye bye bugs and hello enhancements.

Do not forget without IFR there is no flight, without flight there is no life.
Love the app? Rate us!

- With this update a new turn system is introduced: 3°/s (standard), 6°/s and 9°/s turns are now available in the IFR Flight Simulator.
- New task in the IFR Flight Simulator.
